Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to the right of publicity
Summary: Relates to the right of publicity; amends the definitions of "deceased performer", "deceased personality" and "digital replica" in relation to the right of publicity; relates to the use of a deceased performer's digital replica without authorization by the applicable right holder.
LawCode: Amd ยง50-f, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to the right of publicity
